resources.string: By Resgitering, I Agree to Terms & Conditions
We care about your security as well as privacy.

string-array.name: intro_description
string-array.item: Book Security Guards, Bouncers on demand for your events on hourly basis within minutes.

We provide complete security management system for your society which includes Security guards,Security camera installations, Daily Monitoring & Intelligent Softwares as a complete suite at best prices and contracts
This is a simple solution of informing your security guards for hassle free entry of your visitor's cars coming in your building with a simple mobile application.
